trends: There have been no other sightings in Helwan
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy area obeys 3 UFO hot spot criteria: 1- The site is considered sacred or hallowed and is frequently marked with ancient monuments: King Snefru`s Red Pyramid and Bent Pyramid are visible due to contours from where i live, they are about 150-200 km away to the south west, also the mountain supposedly the stones of the Great Pyramid were quarried from to the north, there is a cemetery to the east 2- There`s an energy field in the area: there is a concentration of high voltage power lines to the east 3- There`s always a military presence nearby: yes there is, very near I was standing by the balcony to enjoy late night fresh air, full moon and observe the night sky till my tea water boiled, my eyes were directed towards the objects since my first step into the balcony, i noticed those attractive lights in the sky on the east I thought those could be meteorites coming in, when i had a closer look i noticed no tails, no incoming motion sign and the changing color flashing lights Those objects seemed apparently to be stationery then faded away from the visible dimensions to higher invisible dimensions I was so delighted to witness a visitation from wise, peaceful and super intelligent beings, to be honest, i noticed my music production after that sighting took a different turn, many helpful ideas in many things just pop up into my mind instantly as i think of starting to think about the matter itself, also my determination and desire to work more rose more than it was before i lost sight of the objects as they transcended to higher invisible dimensions, that lead me to the conclusion they could be higher dimensions crafts i have no access to a radar to verify the sighting and i didn`t report that to the authorities here, MUFON are the right people to report to
Summary: just like a gig in the sky
